page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Little local employment in Broadmayne, Warmwell or Poxwell:mainly farming, horticulture,building.A few shops, garages & pubs.Growing number of self-employed:painters,plumbers, saddlers,furnituremakers/restorers, carpenters,electricians,child minders, hairdressers,TV repairers,horse & dog breeders.Employment mainly in Dorchester or Weymouth.Little nemployment but high % of early retired.Most mothers of young children do not work-some when children older. Few households employ domestic labour or gardeners.Most men have professional or skilled work.Few people work shift & most travel by own cars.Winfrith Atomic Energy establishment & Portland research establishment & Armed Forces provide employment.Young people have diffulty in finding permanent jobs.
